item.title: Will Spencer: The Renaissance of Men is Now! [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description: This week Greg sat down with Will Spencer. Will is the host of The Renaissance of Men Podcast. They discussed what biblical masculinity looks like, the "Manosphere", why the secular society seems to hate masculinity, and the nuances between the waves in feminism, why it's not sustainable or biblical, and why Pastors need to start correcting women and not just men from the pulpit. Enjoy!

item.title: Super Producer Leigh Brown: Everything you need to know about the NAR Settlement! [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
This week Greg sat down with Leigh Brown. Leigh is a realtor, past president of the North Carolina Board of realtors, Author, and policy guru. As both Greg & Leah are in real estate, they discussed the National Association of Realtors (NAR) settlement decision, what this means for buyers, sellers, and agents, the broader effects of this ruling, and where the real estate industry will be heading in the near future. This was informative and fun to record. Enjoy!
